cause.description:
Québec is a land of rich heritage for the those of French ancestry in North America. Now I believe is the time to recognize that Québec should become it's own nation due to vast differences in culture, law, and language.
All money raised through this cause will go straight to Parti Québécois, who has promised the people of Quebec another referendum on sovereignty which, this time around, should get the majority.
1. Québec, due to vast cultural and lingual differences, should become a nation separate from Canada.
cause.name: A Sovereign Québec
